headline: Cost down without slowing growth
context: Growing company with operational costs rising with volume.
problem: Costs increasing faster than revenue with hidden waste.
solution: Organized workflows and metrics to guide decisions and cut waste.
result: Operational cost down 25% with clearer KPIs and predictable execution.

headline: Complex rules without losing speed
context: Large-scale operation with complex business rules.
problem: Slow responses and risk when changing rules.
solution: Performance improvements and standardized rules for safer changes.
result: API response time down 10% with safer rule evolution.

headline: Legacy understood in weeks, not months
context: Critical legacy codebase that was hard to evolve.
problem: High time to understand the system and risky changes.
solution: Structured discovery and automation to cut time.

headline: Integrations without constant babysitting
context: Integrations and data flows caused recurring maintenance.
problem: High effort to keep everything running.
solution: Simplified and standardized integrations with higher reliability.
result: Lower maintenance cost and predictable operations.
